channel.title: [508] Palidino76 base question [508]
channel.description: Ok my base is a Palidino76, and as we know the drops rune off of npcdrops.java instead of npcdrops.cfg is there a way to make it where the system thing uses the drops off of npcdrops.cfg(if I made the file)instead of using drops from npcdrops.java ?

there is but i dont feel like posting a fix for the tut that exists(drops only appear to first person who logged on server)
